Competitions.title: Marketplace Maze
Competitions.shortDesc: Challenged participants to navigate complex business scenarios and make strategic decisions. Every choice determined progress toward success or setbacks.

Competitions.title: Chronopreneur
Competitions.shortDesc: An engaging business challenge where creativity met strategy. Participants solved quizzes and built startup concepts within limited timelines.

Festivities.title: Mela
Festivities.shortDesc: A lively blend of games, food, and entertainment while encouraging entrepreneurial spirit. Participants explored business management through a mini-venture experience.
